name: Wonder Wickets
description: A colorful and whimsical minigolf-inspired game set in outer space, featuring tons of unique content, game modes, challenges, a diverse cast of characters, and special controls to create amazing shots!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 Processor: Single-Core 2.4 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 384 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 600 MB available space Additional Notes: Integrated graphics chips are not fully supported and may cause performance issues.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual-Core 3.0 Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Discrete GPU DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Integrated graphics chips are not fully supported and may cause performance issues.
